name: Super Ghouls N Ghosts
description:
A remake of the third game in the legendary Ghosts'n Goblins series,
Super Ghouls'n Ghosts features an additional game mode with new stages.
Follow Arthur in another quest to rescue the princess, his fair maiden
and damsel in distress at large. Players take control of Arthur and
defeat the creatures of the night to save the day once more. Discover
what glory awaits those brave enough to take on the armies of Super
Ghouls'n Ghosts.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
